assessments.status_rationale: No coverage indicated USD/JPY reaching or exceeding 152.50; no definitive FX level reported.
No article reported a VIX close at or above 22.00.
The measurement window runs through 2025-11-30; no conclusive relative performance data provided.

No EIA weekly crude inventory figures were mentioned showing an ≥8.0 million barrel draw.
ISM October Prices Index has not been reported in the provided news; release due by 2025-11-01.
Final October UMich 5–10 year inflation expectations are not in the news and typically release closer to 2025-10-25.
No BEA release data for September Core PCE YoY provided; deadline not yet reached.
No OFAC sanctions specifically tied to Russia–North Korea arms transfers were reported.
No mention of Henry Hub front-month settlement at or above $3.60/MMBtu.
Bond rally headlines noted, but no confirmed 2-year Treasury close at or below 4.30%.
Coverage points to an ongoing shutdown and no Senate-passed CR yet; deadline is 2025-10-31.
